dc_title_s: New map and guide of the city and environs of Detroit.
dc_description_s: Depths shown by soundings. Oriented with north toward the upper right. Shows wards and streetcar lines. "Copyright 1895 by Silas Farmer." Includes street index and guide to "latest changes in street names." "Information indexed, a dictionary of Detroit and its environs" and ill. on verso. 1 map: col.; 69 x 73 cm. folded to 13 x 10 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
